negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hi Oliver! I noticed there are 1 book, 4 hats, and 2 balls available for us to divide up. I was thinking perhaps a fair split would be for me to take the 4 hats, and you can have the book and 2 balls. How does that sound to you? Let me know if you have any other ideas.
oliver replied in round 1: yeah that's perfect. deal!
Alice said in round 2: halt negotiation
oliver replied in round 2: halt negotiation
